TextView.android:text: View details and Manage your profile.

This moment was highly anticipated by our support staff as we now have our own website. Earlier we use to share resources with HyperNought, a company reaching its heights. Today we are independent and can do our best on our own feet. This website is completely dedicated to the lovers and fans of cricket, the game of gentlemen.

We are now a part of a newly established Sports Club named Fizanyatik Sports Club. It was a Cricket Club at a very early stage named Golkothi Cricket Club but in respect to all the sports, we changed it to Golkothi Sports Club. It was then taken over by HyperNought, an IT company lead by Aryan Srivastava and was renamed as HyperSports. But the company was unfortunately closed (on May 2020) claiming lack of support, development and resources. We then made ourselves an independent Sports Club, forgetting all the past and named it as Fizanyatik Sports Club. We belong to a city named Bhagalpur in the state of Bihar, India. Earlier, we played cricket and other sports just for fun but then decided to establish a community and build ourselves stronger. Thus here we are progressing rapidly towards reaching milestones and making records.

Our aims and goals are simple. We want to play professionally and compete as stronger we could. We wanted a revolution in the way we played cricket. We play in a free and fair method with a set of rules guiding us playing good cricket.

Material You or MD3 is the latest design language followed by Google and Android. It contains new UI elements that track with the current design trend of larger visual elements and more whitespace. This new design language could add tension in finding balance in phone UIs where information density is greater. Pure whites are replaced with creamier and warmer palettes. Rounded corners replace hard edges, and there is a greater emphasis on more organic shapes and themes.
